Package space.sunqian.common.object.data

package space.sunqian.common.object.data
Package for data object. A data object may be an instance of Map parsed by MapSchemaParser, or be a non-map object, such as a simple java bean, parsed by ObjectSchemaParser, using codes similar to the following: 

 // Parse a non-map object:
 ObjectSchema objectSchema = ObjectSchema.parse(type);
 String str = objectSchema.getProperty("someString").getValue(instant);

 // Parse a map:
 MapSchema mapSchema = MapSchema.parse(type);
 Type keyType = mapSchema.keyType();

 // Object builder
 ObjectBuilder objectBuilder = ObjectBuilder.get(type);
 Object builder = objectBuilder.newBuilder();
 // copy properties for builder ...
 Object result = objectBuilder.build(builder);

The core interfaces of this package:

  • DataSchema
  • ObjectSchema
  • ObjectProperty
  • ObjectSchemaParser
  • AbstractObjectSchemaHandler
  • SimpleBeanSchemaHandler
  • MapSchema
  • MapSchemaParser
  • ObjectBuilder
  • ObjectBuilderProvider
And utilities:
  • DataObjectKit
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    space.sunqian.common.object.data.handlers
     
  • Class
    Description
    DataObjectException
    Exception for data object.
    DataObjectKit
    Utilities for data object.
    DataSchema
    Top interface of MapSchema and ObjectSchema, presents the schema of a data object.
    MapSchema
    This interface represents the schema of map, provides information about the map's entries.
    MapSchemaParser
    This interface is used to parse Type to MapSchema.
    ObjectBuilder
    This interface is used to build an object for the target type through the following methods: Calls ObjectBuilder.newBuilder() to create a builder for the target type.
    ObjectBuilderProvider
    Provider for getting ObjectBuilder.
    ObjectBuilderProvider.BuilderCache
    Cache of ObjectBuilder for an instance of ObjectBuilderProvider.
    ObjectBuilderProvider.Handler
    Handler for ObjectBuilderProvider, provides the specific builder generating logic.
    ObjectProperty
    This interface represents the property info of ObjectSchema.
    ObjectPropertyBase
    This interface provides the base info for ObjectProperty, typically used in the parsing process of ObjectSchema.
    ObjectSchema
    This interface represents the schema of non-map object, parsed by a ObjectSchemaParser, and provides information about the object's properties.
    ObjectSchemaParser
    This interface is used to parse Type to ObjectSchema.
    ObjectSchemaParser.Context
    Context for parsing the specified Type to ObjectSchema.
    ObjectSchemaParser.Handler
    Handler for ObjectSchemaParser, provides the specific parsing logic.
